body_html:
@drpngx previously, the code haven't been validated by pylint using Google code style. Now I've fixed most of them.

And I'm wondering if these checks can be automatically enabled with I checked in new commits. It's my first time to contribute to tensorflow. Thanks so much.

body:
@drpngx previously, the code haven't been validated by pylint using Google code style. Now I've fixed most of them. 

And I'm wondering if these checks can be automatically enabled with I checked in new commits. It's my first time to contribute to tensorflow. Thanks so much.
